definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: (si vera l.) lit. beautify (then connected with [[נאה]] be comely, so Buhl SS; cf. NH [[נוה]] Niph. shew oneself beautiful, Nithp. adorn oneself, [[נׇוֶה]] adj. beautiful, Levy:NHWB);—Impf. 1 S. sf. [[אַנְוֵהוּ]] Ex 15:2 I will beautify, adorn him (with praises; obj. ´[[י]]; ‖[[רומם]]; LXX duca/sw, Targum glorificabo).—Adj. [[נׇוׇה]] Je 6:2, v. [[נׇאוֶה]] sub [[[נׇאָה]]].
